text: @l_o_v_e_truth @AlexBerenson @VP @GovAbbott Can someone more well informed than myself please explain to me, if it's possible to have both T cells and antibodies present for the same pathogen? Or do the T cells (if present) automatically override/ cancel out the ABs?
